title: When can I watch Dire Wolves at Worlds?

replies.body: Not the greeeeatest time for NZ viewers :/
that's him!!! FiveFiveOpen——White——BenWei Lu（just similar in appearance）

Let's go bois to World's! All the best
! {{sticker:sg-syndra}}

Will I be able to watch it on my favorite twitch channel, OPL? :)

Also when Dire Wolves win worlds will we be getting a BioPanther emote in game?
